name: Echocry: Nox Chiroptera Demonica
description:
This game was made in 6 hours for the MiniJam 2022 with completely original music, art assets,effects, animations and code.

Team 

Thomas Boyster

Alan Hiscott

Lotus Lindez

Ryan Lindez

Performance Problems?

This game requires WebGL 2.0 support, which can sometimes cause issues in certain web browsers. If you have trouble running the game properly, try downloading it instead.
